Package clue

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • clue.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject
    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject
    Represents the state of an instance of a Clue game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int playersNumber
      the number of players in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameState​(java.util.List<Player> players)
      Creates a new GameState object to keep track of the game logic.

      • unregister

        public void unregister​(Observer observer)
        Removes a player from the game. Note that players are not actually removed from the list of players, but instead they are marked as inactive.
        Specified by:
        unregister in interface Subject
        Parameters:
        observer - The player to remove
